item.title: CNHI
item.description: score:144 Chances: CNH Industrial has completed its voluntary delisting of shares from Euronext Milan and is now solely listed on the New York Stock Exchange, which may result in increased visibility and access for investors. The company has also completed the â‚¬400 million component of its $1 billion share buyback program, indicating strong financial stability and commitment to return value to shareholders.
